body_html: We could use tf.Graph.finalize(), which is intended for such purposes. To the original point: the tf.Graph methods for adding ops are definitely not thread-safe, and it would require a big redesign to achieve that (with only a small upside).
body_text: We could use tf.Graph.finalize(), which is intended for such purposes. To the original point: the tf.Graph methods for adding ops are definitely not thread-safe, and it would require a big redesign to achieve that (with only a small upside).
body: We could use [`tf.Graph.finalize()`](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/0.6.0/api_docs/python/framework.html#Graph.finalize), which is intended for such purposes. To the original point: the `tf.Graph` methods for adding ops are definitely not thread-safe, and it would require a big redesign to achieve that (with only a small upside).
